email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

We have a vessel available for your 85,000MT iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Shanghai. MV SEA HORIZON is workable with a laycan of 25-30 September. Rate: USD 28/MT, CFR basis. Demurrage at USD 20,000/day pro rata.

Kind regards,
Julia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems high compared to the current market. We are seeing rates closer to USD 24/MT. Can you revise?

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I can offer USD 26/MT firm. Owners are keen to secure this cargo. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Julia,

USD 26/MT is still above our budget. We can do USD 25/MT max. Please confirm if acceptable.

Regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

After discussing with the owners, we can agree to USD 25/MT. Please confirm your acceptance, and I will prepare the recap.

Best regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao/Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Julia,

Confirmed at USD 25/MT. Please send the recap and CP for review.

Best regards,
Alex
